title:
When is the county or state going to clean out Prince George Creek? It is full of logs, brush and beaver dams. North College Rd. has flooded twice in the past and water was near the top of the road from huricane Isaac. This problem could cause future flooding to rosd and homes in the future.



Thanks

David
